title: Lens Creek
whats_it_like: A local favorite on southern Vancouver Island.  An adventurous day of rapids, shuttling and portaging.

difficulty.text: IV-V at low to medium flows

scouting_portaging: Moderate to difficult.  Some must-run whitewater and a complex near-mandatory portage.
when_to_go: Fall through spring after rain.  Runs when most other things are low.
